scenario.name: Registration Scenario
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:abc.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:User1@abc.com>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:User1@abc.com> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact:<sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 7200 Supported: outbound,path Path: <sip:User1@abc.com:[local_port];lr> P-Visited-Network-Id: abc.com P-Charging-Vector: icid-value=9d462a3f-d11c-45f0-acfc-9572805c94b2172.30.47.19-pcf1.mavenir.lab P-Access-Network-Info: 3GPP-GERAN;cgi-3gpp=11201003f000a User-Agent: sipp Authorization: Digest username="User1@abc.com",nonce="",realm="abc.com",uri="abc.com",response="" Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:abc.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:User1@abc.com>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:User1@abc.com> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 7200 Supported: outbound,path Path: <sip:User1@[local_ip]:[local_port];lr> P-Visited-Network-Id: abc.com [authentication username=aaa@xyz.com password=aaa] User-Agent: sipp Content-Length: 0
